long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension which generates password that are easier to remember instead of passwords like '!Y4SPMvZvfp'

A few features:

1) Clicking on the icon in the chrome toolbar, displays the password and copies the password to your clipboard

2) If you dont like the password, you can click on "Generate" and copy the one you like.
